title: Provides for expiration of temporary state energy and utility service conservation assessment at end of state fiscal year unless governor asks for a continuance
summary: Provides for the expiration of the temporary state energy and utility service conservation assessment at end of each state fiscal year unless the governor requests a continuance of such assessment from the legislature.

       AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the imposition of
         the temporary state energy and utility service conservation assessment
